title: Rito missed a really good opportunity to increase Twisted Tree Line popularity this weekend.
body:
The rewards could've been from 0% IP bonus to 300% IP bonus depending on the "completeness" of the party.

-_-

So a party of 1 player [ no party ] will get 0% IP bonus.

If you have a duo you get 150% IP bonus.

Full party gets 300% IP bonus.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=YOU BEEN WARNED,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=ecBQhzJo,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-19T12:02:49.061+0000)
>
> increase Twisted Tree Line popularity

What makes you think they'd want to do that?

> [{quoted}](name=YOU BEEN WARNED,realm=NA,application-id=LFfTlAky,discussion-id=ecBQhzJo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-19T15:48:28.956+0000)
>
> That sounds like sarcastic bait, but I'll bite with logic.

Don't waste your time. Look, Riot is slowly watching TT die while providing the bare minimum of support, just like they did with Dominion. It's shit, but that's the way it is.

The funny part is that TT has ranked and Riot still doesn't give a fuck. lol

Look at the url for the only board we've got to talk about the alternate maps.

It's /summoners-rift/

ARAM is getting a *little* bit of attention, but Riot has made it clear that they only want *one* serious map.  And if you like TT or Dominion more than Rift?  Well, tough luck.
Irelllvent TT is a a worthless outdated boring garbage mode,it is not relevant to the community any-longer and needs to be removed,entirely.
